title: ISic003531. I.Sicily inscription 003531
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ❦ M(anibus) ❦
P(ublio) ∙ Licinio ∙ Liciniano
vixit ∙ annis ∙ XXXV
Didia ∙ Pistis ∙
5coniugi ∙ benemeren͡t͡ti

Apparatus criticus

Text of Bitto 2001

English translation

To the shades of the Underworld. Didia Pistis for her well deserving husband Publius Licinius Licinianus, who lived 35 years.

Italian translation

Per le ombre dell'aldilà. Didia Pistis per il suo benemerito marito Publius Licinius Licinianus, che visse 36 anni.

commentary
